entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
